SA11bsa003_u:5: na hi kiṃcidapūrvamatra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgrathanakauśalaṃ mamāsti /
SA11bsa003_u:6: ata eva na me parārthacintā svamano vāsayituṃ kṛtaṃ mayedam // SBca_1.2 //
SA11bsa003_u:7: mama tāvadanena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:8: atha matsamadhātureva paśyed aparo 'pyenamato 'pi sārthako 'yam // SBca_1.3 //
SA11bsa003_u:10: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punarapyeṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ // SBca_1.4 //
SA11bsa003_u:11: rātrau yathā meghaghanāndhakāre vidyut kṣaṇaṃ darśayati prakāśam /
SA11bsa003_u:12: buddhānubhāvena tathā kadācil lokasya puṇyeṣu matiḥ kṣaṇaṃ syāt // SBca_1.5 //
SA11bsa003_u:13: tasmācchubhaṃ durbalameva nityaṃ balaṃ tu pāpasya mahatsughoram /
SA11bsa003_u:14: tajjīyate 'nyena śubhena kena saṃbodhicittaṃ yadi nāma na syāt // SBca_1.6 //
SA11bsa003_u:16: yataḥ sukhenaiva sukhaṃ pravṛddham utplāvayatyapramitāñjanaughān // SBca_1.7 //
SA11bsa003_u:18: bahusaukhyaśatāni bhoktukāmair na vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittam // SBca_1.8 //
SA11bsa003_u:19: bhavacārakabandhano varākaḥ sugatānāṃ suta ucyate kṣaṇena /
SA11bsa003_u:20: sanarāmaralokavandanīyo bhavati smodita eva bodhicitte // SBca_1.9 //
SA11bsa003_u:22: rasajātamatīva vedhanīyaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ gṛhṇata bodhicittasaṃjñam // SBca_1.10 //
SA11bsa003_u:25: kadalīva phalaṃ vihāya yāti kṣayamanyat kuśalaṃ hi sarvameva /
SA11bsa003_u:26: satataṃ phalati kṣayaṃ na yāti prasavatyeva tu bodhicittavṛkṣaḥ // SBca_1.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:44: aprameyeṇa puṇyena gṛhyate sma hitāśayaḥ // SBca_1.21 //
SA11bsa003_u:48: devatānāmṛṣīṇāṃ vā brahmaṇāṃ vā bhaviṣyati // SBca_1.23 //
SA11bsa003_u:50: notpannapūrvaḥ svapne 'pi parārthe saṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ // SBca_1.24 //
SA11bsa003_u:54: cittaratnasya yatpuṇyaṃ tatkathaṃ hi pramīyatām // SBca_1.26 //
SA11bsa003_u:58: sukhecchayaiva saṃmohāt svasukhaṃ ghnanti śatruvat // SBca_1.28 //
SA11bsa003_u:60: tṛptiṃ sarvasukhaiḥ kuryātsarvāḥ pīḍāśchinatti ca // SBca_1.29 //
SA11bsa003_u:62: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ // SBca_1.30 //
SA11bsa003_u:69: iti sattrapatau jinasya putre kaluṣaṃ sve hṛdaye karoti yaśca /
SA11bsa003_u:70: kaluṣodayasaṃkhyayā sa kalpān narakeṣvāvasatīti nātha āha // SBca_1.34 //
SA11bsa003_u:71: atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato 'dhikaṃ phalam /
SA11bsa003_u:72: mahatā hi balena pāpakaṃ jinaputreṣu śubhaṃ tvayatnataḥ // SBca_1.35 //
SA11bsa003_u:74: yatrāpakāro 'pi sukhānubandhī sukhākarāṃstān śaraṇaṃ prayāmi // SBca_1.36 //
SA11bsa003_u:75: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ bodhicittānuśaṃsāvivaraṇaṃ nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:79: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalasya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇodadhīnām // SBca_2.1 //
SA11bsa003_u:80: yāvanti puṣpāṇi phalāni caiva bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yāni santi /
SA11bsa003_u:81: ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke jalāni ca svacchamanoramāṇi // SBca_2.2 //
SA11bsa003_u:83: latāḥ sapuṣpābharaṇojjvalāśca drumāśca ye satphalanamraśākhāḥ // SBca_2.3 //
SA11bsa003_u:84: devādilokeṣu ca gandhadhūpāḥ kalpadrumā ratnamayāśca vṛkṣāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:86: akṛṣṭajātāni ca śasyajātāny anyāni vā pūjyavibhūṣaṇāni /
SA11bsa003_u:89: gṛhṇantu tanme varadakṣiṇīyā mahākṛpā māmanukampamānāḥ // SBca_2.6 //
SA11bsa003_u:91: ato mamārthāya parārthacittā gṛhṇantu nāthā idamātmaśaktyā // SBca_2.7 //
SA11bsa003_u:92: dadāmi cātmānamahaṃ jinebhyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca tadātmajebhyaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:93: parigrahaṃ me kurutāgrasattvā yuṣmāsu dāsatvamupaimi bhaktyā // SBca_2.8 //
SA11bsa003_u:95: pūrvaṃ ca pāpaṃ samatikramāmi nānyacca pāpaṃ prakaromi bhūyaḥ // SBca_2.9 //
SA11bsa003_u:99: snānaṃ karomyeṣa tathāgatānāṃ tadātmajānāṃ ca sagītivādyam // SBca_2.11 //
SA11bsa003_u:101: tataḥ suraktāni sudhūpitāni dadāmi tebhyo varacīvarāṇi // SBca_2.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:109: bhojyaiśca khādyairvividhaiśca peyais tebhyo nivedyaṃ ca nivedayāmi // SBca_2.16 //
SA11bsa003_u:111: gandhopalipteṣu ca kuṭṭimeṣu kirāmi puṣpaprakarān manojñān // SBca_2.17 //
SA11bsa003_u:129: dharmaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tathā // SBca_2.26 //
SA11bsa003_u:133: yanmayā paśunā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritameva vā // SBca_2.28 //
SA11bsa003_u:137: guruṣvanyeṣu vā kṣepāt kāyavāgbuddhibhiḥ kṛtaḥ // SBca_2.30 //
SA11bsa003_u:139: yatkṛtaṃ dāruṇaṃ pāpaṃ tatsarvaṃ deśayāmyaham // SBca_2.31 //
SA11bsa003_u:148: apriyā na bhaviṣyanti priyo me na bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:149: ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati // SBca_2.36 //
SA11bsa003_u:153: tannimittaṃ tu yatpāpaṃ tatsthitaṃ ghoramagrataḥ // SBca_2.38 //
SA11bsa003_u:157: āyasya cāgamo nāsti na mariṣyāmi kiṃ nvaham // SBca_2.40 //
SA11bsa003_u:161: puṇyamekaṃ tadā trāṇaṃ mayā tacca na sevitam // SBca_2.42 //
SA11bsa003_u:163: pramattena mayā nāthā bahu pāpamupārjitam // SBca_2.43 //
SA11bsa003_u:171: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye // SBca_2.47 //
SA11bsa003_u:175: śaraṇaṃ yāmi bhāvena bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tathā // SBca_2.49 //
SA11bsa003_u:179: viraumyārtaravaṃ bhītaḥ sa māṃ rakṣatu pāpinam // SBca_2.51 //
SA11bsa003_u:182: yaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva ca saṃtrastāḥ palāyante caturdiśam /
SA11bsa003_u:185: śaraṇaṃ yāmi vo bhīto bhayaṃ nāśayata drutam // SBca_2.54 //
SA11bsa003_u:189: naśyanti yeṣāṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadikṣu na labhyate // SBca_2.56 //
SA11bsa003_u:194: adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yuktā me sukhāsikā /
SA11bsa003_u:195: avaśyameti sā velā na bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ yadā // SBca_2.59 //
SA11bsa003_u:196: abhayaṃ kena me dattaṃ niḥsariṣyāmi vā katham /
SA11bsa003_u:197: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi kasmānme susthitaṃ manaḥ // SBca_2.60 //
SA11bsa003_u:199: yeṣu me 'bhiniviṣṭena gurūṇāṃ laṅghitaṃ vacaḥ // SBca_2.61 //
SA11bsa003_u:201: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ // SBca_2.62 //
SA11bsa003_u:202: iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātriṃdivaṃ tadā /
SA11bsa003_u:203: aśubhānniyataṃ duḥkhaṃ niḥsareyaṃ tataḥ katham // SBca_2.63 //
SA11bsa003_u:205: prakṛtyā yacca sāvadyaṃ prajñaptyāvadyameva ca // SBca_2.64 //
SA11bsa003_u:209: na bhadrakamidaṃ nāthā na kartavyaṃ punarmayā // SBca_2.66 //
SA11bsa003_u:210: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ pāpadeśanā nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:214: anumode pramodena sukhaṃ tiṣṭhantu duḥkhitāḥ // SBca_3.1 //
SA11bsa003_u:225: glānānāmasmi bhaiṣajyaṃ bhaveyaṃ vaidya eva ca /
SA11bsa003_u:233: sarvatyāgaśca nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇārthi ca me manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:234: tyaktavyaṃ cenmayā sarvaṃ varaṃ sattveṣu dīyatām // SBca_3.11 //
SA11bsa003_u:236: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃsubhiḥ // SBca_3.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:237: krīḍantu mama kāyena hasantu vilasantu ca /
SA11bsa003_u:238: dattastebhyo mayā kāyaścintayā kiṃ mamānayā // SBca_3.13 //
SA11bsa003_u:239: kārayantu ca karmāṇi yāni teṣāṃ sukhāvaham /
SA11bsa003_u:242: teṣāṃ sa eva hetuḥ syānnityaṃ sarvārthasiddhaye // SBca_3.15 //
SA11bsa003_u:243: abhyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye 'pyapakāriṇaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:246: pārepsūnāṃ ca naubhūtaḥ setuḥ saṃkrama eva ca // SBca_3.17 //
SA11bsa003_u:258: tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣiṣyāmi yathākramam // SBca_3.23 //
SA11bsa003_u:260: punaḥ pṛṣṭasya puṣṭyarthaṃ cittamevaṃ praharṣayet // SBca_3.24 //
SA11bsa003_u:261: adya me saphalaṃ janma sulabdho mānuṣo bhavaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:262: adya buddhakule jāto buddhaputro 'smi sāṃpratam // SBca_3.25 //
SA11bsa003_u:264: nirmalasya kulasyāsya kalaṅko na bhavedyathā // SBca_3.26 //
SA11bsa003_u:277: jagadadya nimantritaṃ mayā sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā /
SA11bsa003_u:279: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ bodhicittaparigraho nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:285: tatra kuryānna vetyevaṃ pratijñāyāpi yujyate // SBca_4.2 //
SA11bsa003_u:287: mayāpi ca yathāśakti tatra kiṃ parilambyate // SBca_4.3 //
SA11bsa003_u:288: yadi caivaṃ pratijñāya sādhayeyaṃ na karmaṇā /
SA11bsa003_u:289: etāṃ sarvāṃ visaṃvādya kā gatirme bhaviṣyati // SBca_4.4 //
SA11bsa003_u:293: jagatsarvaṃ visaṃvādya kā gatirme bhaviṣyati // SBca_4.6 //
SA11bsa003_u:300: ekasyāpi hi sattvasya hitaṃ hatvā hato bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:305: nādya cetkriyate yatnastalenāsmi talaṃ gataḥ // SBca_4.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:308: adyāpi cettathaiva syāṃ yathaivāhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:315: alabhyamāne mānuṣye pāpameva kutaḥ śubham // SBca_4.17 //
SA11bsa003_u:317: apāyaduḥkhaiḥ saṃmūḍhaḥ kiṃ kariṣyāmyahaṃ tadā // SBca_4.18 //
SA11bsa003_u:323: anādikālopacitāt pāpāt kā sugatau kathā // SBca_4.21 //
SA11bsa003_u:326: nātaḥ parā vañcanāsti na ca moho 'styataḥ paraḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:327: yadīdṛśaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prāpya nābhyastaṃ kuśalaṃ mayā // SBca_4.23 //
SA11bsa003_u:328: yadi caivaṃ vimṛṣyāmi punaḥ sīdāmi mohitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:329: śociṣyāmi ciraṃ bhūyo yamadūtaiḥ pracoditaḥ // SBca_4.24 //
SA11bsa003_u:330: ciraṃ dhakṣyati me kāyaṃ nārakāgniḥ suduḥsahaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:333: jānannapi ca nīye 'haṃ tāneva narakān punaḥ // SBca_4.26 //
SA11bsa003_u:334: atra me cetanā nāsti mantrairiva vimohitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:335: na jāne kena muhyāmi ko 'trāntarmama tiṣṭhati // SBca_4.27 //
SA11bsa003_u:337: na śūrā na ca te prājñāḥ kathaṃ dāsīkṛto 'smi taiḥ // SBca_4.28 //
SA11bsa003_u:340: sarve devā manuṣyāśca yadi syurmama śatravaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:341: te 'pi nāvīcikaṃ vahniṃ samudānayituṃ kṣamāḥ // SBca_4.30 //
SA11bsa003_u:343: kṣaṇāt kṣipanti māṃ tatra balinaḥ kleśaśatravaḥ // SBca_4.31 //
SA11bsa003_u:349: hṛdaye nivasatsu nirbhayaṃ mama saṃsāraratiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // SBca_4.34 //
SA11bsa003_u:351: mativeśmani lobhapañjare yadi tiṣṭhanti kutaḥ sukhaṃ mama // SBca_4.35 //
SA11bsa003_u:352: tasmānna tāvadahamatra dhuraṃ kṣipāmi yāvanna śatrava ime nihatāḥ samakṣam /
SA11bsa003_u:353: svalpe 'pi tāvadapakāriṇi baddharoṣā mānonnatāstamanihatya na yānti nidrām // SBca_4.36 //
SA11bsa003_u:358: bhavati mama viṣādadainyamadya vyasanaśatairapi kena hetunā vai // SBca_4.38 //
SA11bsa003_u:360: mahārthasiddhyai tu samudyatasya duḥkhāni kasmānmama bādhakāni // SBca_4.39 //
SA11bsa003_u:362: śītātapādivyasanaṃ sahante jagaddhitārthaṃ na kathaṃ sahe 'ham // SBca_4.40 //
SA11bsa003_u:364: pratijñāya madātmāpi na kleśebhyo vimocitaḥ // SBca_4.41 //
SA11bsa003_u:369: galantvantrāṇi me kāmaṃ śiraḥ patatu nāma me /
SA11bsa003_u:370: na tvevāvanatiṃ yāmi sarvathā kleśavairiṇām // SBca_4.44 //
SA11bsa003_u:371: nirvāsitasyāpi tu nāma śatrordeśāntare sthānaparigrahaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:372: yataḥ punaḥ saṃbhṛtaśaktireti na kleśaśatrorgatirīdṛśī tu // SBca_4.45 //
SA11bsa003_u:373: kvāsau yāyānmanmanaḥstho nirastaḥ sthitvā yasmin madvadhārthaṃ yateta /
SA11bsa003_u:374: nodyogo me kevalaṃ mandabuddheḥ kleśāḥ prajñādṛṣṭisādhyā varākāḥ // SBca_4.46 //
SA11bsa003_u:375: na kleśā viṣayeṣu nendriyagaṇe nāpyantarāle sthitā
SA11bsa003_u:376: nāto 'nyatra kuha sthitāḥ punaramī mathnanti kṛtsnaṃ jagat /
SA11bsa003_u:385: na śikṣā rakṣituṃ śakyā calaṃ cittamarakṣatā // SBca_5.1 //
SA11bsa003_u:386: adāntā mattamātaṅgā na kurvantīha tāṃ vyathām /
SA11bsa003_u:390: vyāghrāḥ siṃhā gajā ṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ sarve ca śatravaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:393: cittasyaikasya damanāt sarve dāntā bhavanti ca // SBca_5.5 //
SA11bsa003_u:397: taptāyaḥkuṭṭimaṃ kena kuto jātāśca tāḥ striyaḥ // SBca_5.7 //
SA11bsa003_u:399: tasmānna kaścit trailokye cittādanyo bhayānakaḥ // SBca_5.8 //
SA11bsa003_u:403: dānapāramitā proktā tasmātsā cittameva tu // SBca_5.10 //
SA11bsa003_u:404: matsyādayaḥ kva nīyantāṃ mārayeyaṃ yato na tān /
SA11bsa003_u:405: labdhe viraticitte tu śīlapāramitā matā // SBca_5.11 //
SA11bsa003_u:407: mārite krodhacitte tu māritāḥ sarvaśatravaḥ // SBca_5.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:410: bāhyā bhāvā mayā tadvacchakyā vārayituṃ na hi /
SA11bsa003_u:416: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ te bhramanti mudhāmbare /
SA11bsa003_u:417: yairetaddharmasarvasvaṃ cittaṃ guhyaṃ na bhāvitam // SBca_5.17 //
SA11bsa003_u:419: cittarakṣāvrataṃ mukttvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ // SBca_5.18 //
SA11bsa003_u:426: lābhā naśyantu me kāmaṃ satkāraḥ kāyajīvitam /
SA11bsa003_u:427: naśyatvanyacca kuśalaṃ mā tu cittaṃ kadācana // SBca_5.22 //
SA11bsa003_u:429: smṛtiṃ ca saṃprajanyaṃ ca sarvayatnena rakṣata // SBca_5.23 //
SA11bsa003_u:431: tathābhyāṃ vikalaṃ cittaṃ na kṣamaṃ sarvakarmasu // SBca_5.24 //
SA11bsa003_u:437: upacityāpi puṇyāni muṣitā yānti durgatim // SBca_5.27 //
SA11bsa003_u:448: saṃprajanyaṃ tadāyāti na ca yātyāgataṃ punaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:455: ābhāsamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca svāgatārthaṃ vilokayet // SBca_5.36 //
SA11bsa003_u:457: diśo viśramya vīkṣeta parāvṛtyaiva pṛṣṭhataḥ // SBca_5.37 //
SA11bsa003_u:459: evaṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu kāryaṃ buddhvā samācaret // SBca_5.38 //
SA11bsa003_u:461: kathaṃ kāyaḥ sthita iti draṣṭavyaṃ punarantarā // SBca_5.39 //
SA11bsa003_u:463: dharmacintāmahāstambhe yathā baddho na mucyate // SBca_5.40 //
SA11bsa003_u:464: kutra me vartata iti pratyavekṣyaṃ tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:470: evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ sarvamanyathā nobhayaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:479: na kartavyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavattadā // SBca_5.48 //
SA11bsa003_u:481: sotprāsātiśayaṃ vakraṃ vañcakaṃ ca mano bhavet // SBca_5.49 //
SA11bsa003_u:485: upasthānārthe me cittaṃ tasmāttiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat // SBca_5.51 //
SA11bsa003_u:487: vaktumicchati me cittaṃ tasmāttiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat // SBca_5.52 //
SA11bsa003_u:491: nigṛhṇīyād dṛḍhaṃ śūraḥ pratipakṣeṇa tatsadā // SBca_5.54 //
SA11bsa003_u:501: na karotyanyathā kāyaḥ kasmādatra pratikriyām // SBca_5.59 //
SA11bsa003_u:503: tvattaścetpṛthagevāyaṃ tenātra tava ko vyayaḥ // SBca_5.60 //
SA11bsa003_u:504: na svīkaroṣi he mūḍha kāṣṭhaputtalakaṃ śucim /
SA11bsa003_u:510: evamanviṣya yatnena na dṛṣṭaṃ sāramatra te /
SA11bsa003_u:511: adhunā vada kasmāttvaṃ kāyamadyāpi rakṣasi // SBca_5.64 //
SA11bsa003_u:512: na khāditavyamaśuci tvayā peyaṃ na śoṇitam /
SA11bsa003_u:513: nāntrāṇi cūṣitavyāni kiṃ kāyena kariṣyasi // SBca_5.65 //
SA11bsa003_u:517: kāyaṃ dāsyati gṛdhrebhyastadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi // SBca_5.67 //
SA11bsa003_u:518: na sthāsyatīti bhṛtyāya na vastrādi pradīyate /
SA11bsa003_u:519: kāyo yāsyati khāditvā kasmāttvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam // SBca_5.68 //
SA11bsa003_u:521: na hi vaitanikopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate // SBca_5.69 //
SA11bsa003_u:531: pratīcchecchirasā vākyaṃ sarvaśiṣyaḥ sadā bhavet // SBca_5.74 //
SA11bsa003_u:536: sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sā vittairapi durlabhā /
SA11bsa003_u:538: na cātra me vyayaḥ kaścitparatra ca mahatsukham /
SA11bsa003_u:539: aprītiduḥkhaṃ dveṣaistu mahadduḥkhaṃ paratra ca // SBca_5.78 //
SA11bsa003_u:543: etāneva samāśritya buddhatvaṃ me bhaviṣyati // SBca_5.80 //
SA11bsa003_u:545: guṇopakārikṣetre ca duḥkhite ca mahacchubham // SBca_5.81 //
SA11bsa003_u:557: tulyāśaye tu tattyājyamitthaṃ na parihīyate // SBca_5.87 //
SA11bsa003_u:558: dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭite vadet /
SA11bsa003_u:563: na cācāraṃ parityajya sūtramantraiḥ pralobhayet // SBca_5.90 //
SA11bsa003_u:565: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeścāpi garhitam // SBca_5.91 //
SA11bsa003_u:567: pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhū mardayetsamam // SBca_5.92 //
SA11bsa003_u:569: lokāprasādakaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca varjayet // SBca_5.93 //
SA11bsa003_u:578: rātriṃdivaṃ ca triskandhaṃ triṣkālaṃ ca pravartayet /
SA11bsa003_u:580: yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
SA11bsa003_u:581: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ // SBca_5.99 //
SA11bsa003_u:582: na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:583: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ // SBca_5.100 //
SA11bsa003_u:585: sattvānāmeva cārthāya sarvaṃ bodhāya nāmayet // SBca_5.101 //
SA11bsa003_u:586: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe 'pi na tyajet /
SA11bsa003_u:596: yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate /
SA11bsa003_u:600: kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:602: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ saṃprajanyarakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:607: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:609: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśnute /
SA11bsa003_u:610: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite // SBca_6.3 //
SA11bsa003_u:614: saṃkṣepānnāsti tatkiṃcit krodhano yena susthitaḥ // SBca_6.5 //
SA11bsa003_u:616: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca // SBca_6.6 //
SA11bsa003_u:618: daurmanasyāśanaṃ prāpya dveṣo dṛpto nihanti mām // SBca_6.7 //
SA11bsa003_u:624: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim // SBca_6.10 //
SA11bsa003_u:628: duḥkhenaiva ca niḥsāraḥ cetastasmād dṛḍhībhava // SBca_6.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:630: vṛthā sahante muktyarthamahaṃ kasmāttu kātaraḥ // SBca_6.13 //
SA11bsa003_u:634: mahatkaṇḍvādiduḥkhaṃ ca kimanarthaṃ na paśyasi // SBca_6.15 //
SA11bsa003_u:636: saukumāryaṃ na kartavyamanyathā vardhate vyathā // SBca_6.16 //
SA11bsa003_u:638: paraśoṇitamapyeke dṛṣṭvā mūrcchāṃ vrajanti yat // SBca_6.17 //
SA11bsa003_u:641: duḥkhe 'pi naiva cittasya prasādaṃ kṣobhayed budhaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:642: saṃgrāmo hi saha kleśairyuddhe ca sulabhā vyathā // SBca_6.19 //
SA11bsa003_u:644: te te vijayinaḥ śūrāḥ śeṣāstu mṛtamārakāḥ // SBca_6.20 //
SA11bsa003_u:646: saṃsāriṣu ca kāruṇyaṃ pāpādbhītirjine spṛhā // SBca_6.21 //
SA11bsa003_u:648: sacetaneṣu kiṃ kopaḥ te 'pi pratyayakopitāḥ // SBca_6.22 //
SA11bsa003_u:651: kupyāmīti na saṃcintya kupyati svecchayā janaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:652: utpatsya ityabhipretya krodha utpadyate na ca // SBca_6.24 //
SA11bsa003_u:654: sarvaṃ tatpratyayabalāt svatantraṃ tu na vidyate // SBca_6.25 //
SA11bsa003_u:656: na cāpi janitasyāsti janito 'smīti cetanā // SBca_6.26 //
SA11bsa003_u:658: tadeva hi bhavābhīti na saṃcintyopajāyate // SBca_6.27 //
SA11bsa003_u:659: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
SA11bsa003_u:663: yaḥ pūrvavat kriyākāle kriyāyāstena kiṃ kṛtam /
SA11bsa003_u:665: evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvaṃ yadvaśaṃ so 'pi cāvaśaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:667: vāraṇāpi na yuktaivaṃ kaḥ kiṃ vārayatīti cet /
SA11bsa003_u:670: īdṛśāḥ pratyayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhavet // SBca_6.33 //
SA11bsa003_u:671: yadi tu svecchayā siddhiḥ sarveṣāmeva dehinām /
SA11bsa003_u:672: na bhavetkasyacidduḥkhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ kaścidicchati // SBca_6.34 //
SA11bsa003_u:678: tadaiṣāṃ parakāyeṣu parihāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet // SBca_6.37 //
SA11bsa003_u:680: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham // SBca_6.38 //
SA11bsa003_u:682: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake // SBca_6.39 //
SA11bsa003_u:685: mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
SA11bsa003_u:686: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam // SBca_6.41 //
SA11bsa003_u:689: tacchastraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
SA11bsa003_u:690: tena śastraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.43 //
SA11bsa003_u:692: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.44 //
SA11bsa003_u:696: matkarmajanitā eva tathedaṃ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.46 //
SA11bsa003_u:698: yena yāsyanti narakānmayaivāmī hatā nanu // SBca_6.47 //
SA11bsa003_u:699: etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
SA11bsa003_u:700: māmāśritya tu yāntyete narakān dīrghavedanān // SBca_6.48 //
SA11bsa003_u:704: eṣāmatra kimāyātaṃ yadyātmā rakṣito mayā // SBca_6.50 //
SA11bsa003_u:705: atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:706: hīyate cāpi me caryā tasmānnaṣṭāstapasvinaḥ // SBca_6.51 //
SA11bsa003_u:710: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi // SBca_6.53 //
SA11bsa003_u:711: mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:712: iha janmāntare vāpi yenāsau me 'nabhīpsitaḥ // SBca_6.54 //
SA11bsa003_u:714: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam // SBca_6.55 //
SA11bsa003_u:716: yasmācciramapi sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadeva me // SBca_6.56 //
SA11bsa003_u:717: svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
SA11bsa003_u:718: muhūrtamaparo yaśca sukhī bhūtvā vibudhyate // SBca_6.57 //
SA11bsa003_u:721: labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
SA11bsa003_u:722: riktahastaśca nagnaśca yāsyāmi muṣito yathā // SBca_6.59 //
SA11bsa003_u:723: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
SA11bsa003_u:724: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu // SBca_6.60 //
SA11bsa003_u:728: parāyaśaskare 'pyevaṃ kopaste kiṃ na jāyate // SBca_6.62 //
SA11bsa003_u:732: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā // SBca_6.64 //
SA11bsa003_u:736: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ // SBca_6.66 //
SA11bsa003_u:738: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam // SBca_6.67 //
SA11bsa003_u:739: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:741: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
SA11bsa003_u:742: yena sarve bhaviṣyanti maitracittāḥ parasparam // SBca_6.69 //
SA11bsa003_u:752: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā // SBca_6.74 //
SA11bsa003_u:753: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:756: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi // SBca_6.76 //
SA11bsa003_u:757: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
SA11bsa003_u:758: na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhiḥ parāvarjanamuttamam // SBca_6.77 //
SA11bsa003_u:759: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa003_u:766: satkāramitvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ kiṃ paridahyase // SBca_6.81 //
SA11bsa003_u:767: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:768: kuṭumbajīvinaṃ labdhvā na hṛṣyasi prakupyasi // SBca_6.82 //
SA11bsa003_u:769: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati /
SA11bsa003_u:771: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
SA11bsa003_u:772: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim // SBca_6.84 //
SA11bsa003_u:774: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi // SBca_6.85 //
SA11bsa003_u:775: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
SA11bsa003_u:779: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
SA11bsa003_u:780: athāpyartho bhavedevamanarthaḥ ko nvataḥ paraḥ // SBca_6.88 //
SA11bsa003_u:782: yato narakapālāstvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti kumbhiṣu // SBca_6.89 //
SA11bsa003_u:783: stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
SA11bsa003_u:784: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me // SBca_6.90 //
SA11bsa003_u:788: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham // SBca_6.92 //
SA11bsa003_u:790: tathā stutiyaśohānau svacittaṃ pratibhāti me // SBca_6.93 //
SA11bsa003_u:792: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ityetatprītikāraṇam // SBca_6.94 //
SA11bsa003_u:793: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
SA11bsa003_u:794: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ // SBca_6.95 //
SA11bsa003_u:796: kasmādanyaprasādena sukhiteṣu na me sukham // SBca_6.96 //
SA11bsa003_u:800: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate // SBca_6.98 //
SA11bsa003_u:802: apāyapātarakṣārthaṃ pravṛttā nanu te mama // SBca_6.99 //
SA11bsa003_u:804: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhāddveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // SBca_6.100 //
SA11bsa003_u:806: buddhādhiṣṭhānata iva dveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // SBca_6.101 //
SA11bsa003_u:808: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti nanvetattadupasthitam // SBca_6.102 //
SA11bsa003_u:811: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
SA11bsa003_u:812: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate // SBca_6.104 //
SA11bsa003_u:814: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate // SBca_6.105 //
SA11bsa003_u:820: etasmai prathamaṃ deyametatpūrvā kṣamā yataḥ // SBca_6.108 //
SA11bsa003_u:821: kṣamāsiddhyāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:824: anyathā me kathaṃ kṣāntirbhiṣajīva hitodyate // SBca_6.110 //
SA11bsa003_u:826: sa evātaḥ kṣamāhetuḥ pūjyaḥ saddharmavanmayā // SBca_6.111 //
SA11bsa003_u:828: etānārādhya bahavaḥ saṃpatpāraṃ yato gatāḥ // SBca_6.112 //
SA11bsa003_u:830: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ // SBca_6.113 //
SA11bsa003_u:831: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:832: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ // SBca_6.114 //
SA11bsa003_u:836: na tu buddhaiḥ samāḥ kecidanantāṃśairguṇārṇavaiḥ // SBca_6.116 //
SA11bsa003_u:838: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam // SBca_6.117 //
SA11bsa003_u:842: sattvārādhanamutsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet // SBca_6.119 //
SA11bsa003_u:843: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:845: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapekṣāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:846: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam // SBca_6.121 //
SA11bsa003_u:847: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
SA11bsa003_u:849: ādīptakāyasya yathā samantān na sarvakāmairapi saumanasyam /
SA11bsa003_u:850: sattvavyathāyāmapi tadvadeva na prītyupāyo 'sti dayāmayānām // SBca_6.123 //
SA11bsa003_u:852: tadadya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditāstanmunayaḥ kṣamantām // SBca_6.124 //
SA11bsa003_u:854: kurvantu me mūrghni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ // SBca_6.125 //
SA11bsa003_u:857: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpās ta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra // SBca_6.126 //
SA11bsa003_u:861: vikartuṃ naiva śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ // SBca_6.128 //
SA11bsa003_u:862: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
SA11bsa003_u:863: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcidaparāddhaṃ vimānayet // SBca_6.129 //
SA11bsa003_u:871: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥsausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi // SBca_6.133 //
SA11bsa003_u:873: cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran // SBca_6.134 //
SA11bsa003_u:874: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa003_u:877: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
SA11bsa003_u:878: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ // SBca_7.1 //
SA11bsa003_u:886: tathāpi nidrāṃ yāsyeva caṇḍālamahiṣo yathā // SBca_7.5 //
SA11bsa003_u:888: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ // SBca_7.6 //
SA11bsa003_u:900: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate // SBca_7.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:904: mūḍha kālo na nidrāyā iyaṃ naurdurlabhā punaḥ // SBca_7.14 //
SA11bsa003_u:913: kimutāhaṃ naro jātyā śakto jñātuṃ hitāhitam /
SA11bsa003_u:919: idaṃ tu me parimitaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbodhisādhanam /
SA11bsa003_u:928: māṃsāsthi tyajatastasya tadā kiṃ nāma duṣkaram // SBca_7.26 //
SA11bsa003_u:930: mithyākalpanayā citte pāpātkāye yato vyathā // SBca_7.27 //
SA11bsa003_u:931: puṇyena kāyaḥ sukhitaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi /
SA11bsa003_u:932: tiṣṭhan parārthaṃ saṃsāre kṛpāluḥ kena khidyate // SBca_7.28 //
SA11bsa003_u:942: ekaikasyāpi doṣasya yatra kalpārṇavaiḥ kṣayaḥ // SBca_7.33 //
SA11bsa003_u:944: aprameyavyathābhājye noraḥ sphuṭati me katham // SBca_7.34 //
SA11bsa003_u:948: vṛthā nītaṃ mayā janma kathaṃcillabdhamadbhutam // SBca_7.36 //
SA11bsa003_u:950: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā // SBca_7.37 //
SA11bsa003_u:951: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:954: vipattirīdṛśī jātā ko dharme chandamutsṛjet // SBca_7.39 //
SA11bsa003_u:955: kuśalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ chandaṃ mūlaṃ munirjagau /
SA11bsa003_u:966: sugatasutā bhavanti sugatasya puraḥ kuśalaiḥ // SBca_7.44 //
SA11bsa003_u:974: anārambho varaṃ nāma na tvārabhya nivartanam // SBca_7.47 //
SA11bsa003_u:976: anyacca kāryakālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tacca na sādhitam // SBca_7.48 //
SA11bsa003_u:980: tasmānmayaiṣāṃ kartavyaṃ nāśakto 'haṃ yathā janaḥ // SBca_7.50 //
SA11bsa003_u:981: nīcaṃ karma karotyanyaḥ kathaṃ mayyapi tiṣṭhati /
SA11bsa003_u:982: mānāccenna karomyetanmāno naśyatu me varam // SBca_7.51 //
SA11bsa003_u:984: āpadābādhate 'lpāpi mano me yadi durbalam // SBca_7.52 //
SA11bsa003_u:989: mayā hi sarvaṃ jetavyamahaṃ jeyo na kenacit /
SA11bsa003_u:990: mayaiṣa māno voḍhavyo jinasiṃhasuto hyaham // SBca_7.55 //
SA11bsa003_u:991: ye sattvā mānavijitā varakāste na māninaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:992: mānī śatruvaśaṃ naiti mānaśatruvaśāśca te // SBca_7.56 //
SA11bsa003_u:994: parapiṇḍāśino dāsā mūrkhā durdarśanāḥ kṛśā // SBca_7.57 //
SA11bsa003_u:996: te 'pi cenmānināṃ madhye dīnāstu vada kīdṛśāḥ // SBca_7.58 //
SA11bsa003_u:997: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrā ye mānaśatruvijayāya vahanti mānam /
SA11bsa003_u:998: ye taṃ sphurantamapi mānaripuṃ nihatya kāmaṃ jane jayaphalaṃ pratipādayanti // SBca_7.59 //
SA11bsa003_u:1001: mahatsvapi hi kṛcchreṣu na rasaṃ cakṣurīkṣate /
SA11bsa003_u:1002: evaṃ kṛcchramapi prāpya na kleśavaśago bhavet // SBca_7.61 //
SA11bsa003_u:1005: sukhārthaṃ kriyate karma tathāpi syānna vā sukham /
SA11bsa003_u:1006: karmaiva tu sukhaṃ yasya niṣkarmā sa sukhī katham // SBca_7.63 //

SA11bsa003_u:1533: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa003_u:1535: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
SA11bsa003_u:1538: ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ // SBca_9.64 //
SA11bsa003_u:1539: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1546: viśeṣaśca yadā mithyā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayastadā // SBca_9.68 //
SA11bsa003_u:1552: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // SBca_9.71 //
SA11bsa003_u:1554: nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu // SBca_9.72 //
SA11bsa003_u:1557: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
SA11bsa003_u:1561: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
SA11bsa003_u:1563: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1564: duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate // SBca_9.77 //
SA11bsa003_u:1566: tato 'pi na nivartyaścet varaṃ nairātmyabhāvanā // SBca_9.78 //
SA11bsa003_u:1567: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
SA11bsa003_u:1568: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ // SBca_9.79 //
SA11bsa003_u:1569: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1570: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ // SBca_9.80 //
SA11bsa003_u:1572: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ // SBca_9.81 //
SA11bsa003_u:1575: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa003_u:1576: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // SBca_9.83 //
SA11bsa003_u:1580: evaṃ karādau sā yāvattāvatkāyo 'tra dṛśyate // SBca_9.85 //
SA11bsa003_u:1585: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1586: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ // SBca_9.88 //
SA11bsa003_u:1587: yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate /
SA11bsa003_u:1588: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate // SBca_9.89 //
SA11bsa003_u:1590: vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā // SBca_9.90 //
SA11bsa003_u:1591: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
SA11bsa003_u:1600: apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ // SBca_9.95 //
SA11bsa003_u:1602: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya // SBca_9.96 //
SA11bsa003_u:1606: kimarthamayamāyāsaḥ bādhā kasya kuto bhavet // SBca_9.98 //
SA11bsa003_u:1607: yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
SA11bsa003_u:1608: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase // SBca_9.99 //
SA11bsa003_u:1613: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1614: nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā // SBca_9.102 //
SA11bsa003_u:1615: nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
SA11bsa003_u:1617: yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
SA11bsa003_u:1618: tanna kiṃcidataḥ sattvāḥ prakṛtyā parinirvṛtāḥ // SBca_9.104 //
SA11bsa003_u:1620: jñeyena saha cejjñānaṃ kimālambyāsya saṃbhavaḥ // SBca_9.105 //
SA11bsa003_u:1621: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:1624: atha sāpyanyasaṃvṛtyā syātsattvo nirvṛtaḥ kutaḥ // SBca_9.107 //
SA11bsa003_u:1626: sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ // SBca_9.108 //
SA11bsa003_u:1634: yadi jñeyavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ // SBca_9.112 //
SA11bsa003_u:1635: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1637: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1638: putrābhāve pitā nāsti tathāsattvaṃ tayordvayoḥ // SBca_9.114 //
SA11bsa003_u:1640: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate // SBca_9.115 //
SA11bsa003_u:1642: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate // SBca_9.116 //
SA11bsa003_u:1648: bhūtāni cedbhavatvevaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ // SBca_9.119 //
SA11bsa003_u:1649: api tvaneke 'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1650: laṅghyāścāśucayaścaiva kṣmādayo na sa īśvaraḥ // SBca_9.120 //
SA11bsa003_u:1653: tena kiṃ sraṣṭumiṣṭaṃ ca ātmā cet nanvasau dhruvaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1654: kṣmādisvabhāva īśaśca jñānaṃ jñeyādanādi ca // SBca_9.122 //
SA11bsa003_u:1655: karmaṇaḥ sukhaduḥkhe ca vada kiṃ tena nirmitam /
SA11bsa003_u:1656: hetorādirna cedasti phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet // SBca_9.123 //
SA11bsa003_u:1657: kasmātsadā na kurute na hi so 'nyamapekṣate /
SA11bsa003_u:1662: icchannapīcchāyattaḥ syāt kurvataḥ kuta īśatā // SBca_9.126 //
SA11bsa003_u:1664: sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānamicchanti nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam // SBca_9.127 //
SA11bsa003_u:1668: evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā // SBca_9.129 //
SA11bsa003_u:1672: sukhādyeva ca te hetuḥ na ca tasmātpaṭādayaḥ // SBca_9.131 //
SA11bsa003_u:1675: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
SA11bsa003_u:1676: tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham // SBca_9.133 //
SA11bsa003_u:1682: annādo 'medhyabhakṣaḥ syāt phalaṃ hetau yadi sthitam // SBca_9.136 //
SA11bsa003_u:1684: mohāccennekṣate lokaḥ tattvajñasyāpi sā sthitiḥ // SBca_9.137 //
SA11bsa003_u:1690: tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā // SBca_9.140 //
SA11bsa003_u:1691: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
SA11bsa003_u:1692: tadbhāvakalpanotpādaṃ vibadhnāti mṛṣā ca sā // SBca_9.141 //
SA11bsa003_u:1694: na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣu vyavasthitam // SBca_9.142 //
SA11bsa003_u:1695: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
SA11bsa003_u:1696: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam // SBca_9.143 //
SA11bsa003_u:1698: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām // SBca_9.144 //
SA11bsa003_u:1700: pratibimbasame tasmin kṛtrime satyatā katham // SBca_9.145 //
SA11bsa003_u:1704: tadavastha kathaṃ bhāvaḥ ko vānyo bhāvatāṃ gataḥ // SBca_9.147 //
SA11bsa003_u:1709: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
SA11bsa003_u:1712: nirvṛtānirvṛtānāṃ ca viśeṣo nāsti vastutaḥ // SBca_9.151 //
SA11bsa003_u:1713: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa003_u:1714: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati // SBca_9.152 //
SA11bsa003_u:1715: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
SA11bsa003_u:1716: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ // SBca_9.153 //
SA11bsa003_u:1717: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
SA11bsa003_u:1718: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt // SBca_9.154 //
SA11bsa003_u:1724: āgatyāgatya sugatiṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā sukhocitāḥ // SBca_9.157 //
SA11bsa003_u:1751: tena sarve janāḥ santu bodhicaryāvibhūṣaṇāḥ // SBca_10.1 //
SA11bsa003_u:1764: so 'ṅgārarāśirmaṇirāśirastu taptā ca bhūḥ sphāṭikakuṭṭimaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa003_u:1767: tacchastrayuddhaṃ ca paraspareṇa krīḍārthamadyāstu ca puṣpayuddham // SBca_10.9 //
SA11bsa003_u:1769: mama kuśalabalena prāptadivyātmabhāvāḥ saha suravanitābhiḥ santu mandākinīsthāḥ // SBca_10.10 //
SA11bsa003_u:1770: trastāḥ paśyantvakasmādiha yamapuruṣāḥ kākagṛdhrāśca ghorā dhvāntaṃ
SA11bsa003_u:1773: dṛṣṭvā prāmodyavegādvyapagataduritā yāntu tenaiva sārdham // SBca_10.11 //
SA11bsa003_u:1776: kimidamiti sukhenāhlāditānāmakasmād bhavatu kamalapāṇerdarśanaṃ nārakāṇām // SBca_10.12 //
SA11bsa003_u:1777: āyātāyāta śīghraṃ bhayamapanayata bhrātaro jīvitāḥ smaḥ
SA11bsa003_u:1780: jātaṃ saṃbodhicittaṃ sakalajanaparitrāṇamātā dayā ca // SBca_10.13 //
SA11bsa003_u:1784: rdṛṣṭvāgre mañjughoṣaṃ bhavatu kalakalaḥ sāṃprataṃ nārakāṇām // SBca_10.14 //
SA11bsa003_u:1790: bhavantu sukhinaḥ pretā yathottarakurau narāḥ // SBca_10.17 //
SA11bsa003_u:1791: saṃtarpyantāṃ pretāḥ snāpyantāṃ śītalā bhavantu sadā /
SA11bsa003_u:1793: andhāḥ paśyantu rūpāṇi śṛṇvantu badhirāḥ sadā /
SA11bsa003_u:1798: udvignāśca nirudvegā dhṛtimanto bhavantu ca // SBca_10.21 //
SA11bsa003_u:1800: durbalā balinaḥ santu snigdhacittāḥ parasparam // SBca_10.22 //
SA11bsa003_u:1801: sarvā diśaḥ śivāḥ santu sarveṣāṃ pathivartinām /
SA11bsa003_u:1802: yena kāryeṇa gacchanti tadupāyena sidhyatu // SBca_10.23 //
SA11bsa003_u:1804: kṣemeṇa kūlamāsādya ramantāṃ saha bandhubhiḥ // SBca_10.24 //
SA11bsa003_u:1815: yāḥ kāścana striyo loke puruṣatvaṃ vrajantu tāḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1816: prāpnuvantūccatāṃ nīcā hatamānā bhavantu ca // SBca_10.30 //
SA11bsa003_u:1818: viramya sarvapāpebhyaḥ kurvantu kuśalaṃ sadā // SBca_10.31 //
SA11bsa003_u:1822: nityaṃ jīvantu sukhitā mṛtyuśabdo 'pi naśyatu // SBca_10.33 //
SA11bsa003_u:1826: mṛdvī ca vaiḍūryamayī bhūmiḥ sarvatra tiṣṭhatu // SBca_10.35 //
SA11bsa003_u:1834: sphīto bhavatu lokaśca rājā bhavatu dhārmikaḥ // SBca_10.39 //
SA11bsa003_u:1835: śaktā bhavantu cauṣadhyo mantrāḥ sidhyantu jāpinām /
SA11bsa003_u:1837: mā kaścidduḥkhitaḥ sattvo mā pāpī mā ca rogitaḥ /
SA11bsa003_u:1838: mā hīnaḥ paribhūto vā mā bhūtkaścicca durmanāḥ // SBca_10.41 //
SA11bsa003_u:1840: nityaṃ syātsaṃghasāmagrī saṃghakāryaṃ ca sidhyatu // SBca_10.42 //
SA11bsa003_u:1861: yadā ca draṣṭukāmaḥ syāṃ praṣṭukāmaśca kiṃcana /
SA11bsa003_u:1864: yathā carati mañjuśrīḥ saiva caryā bhavenmama // SBca_10.54 //
